Description.Title: Soil Temperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: A one-dimensional soil temperature component that simulates heat flux and temperatures across a layered soil profile, including an air node, surface node, layer-center nodes, and phantom nodes below the profile. Thermal properties (volumetric heat capacity and thermal conductivity) are derived from soil composition and water content; the heat diffusion equation is solved using a tri-diagonal Thomas algorithm with a configurable Crankâ€“Nicolson weighting. The model calculates atmospheric boundary layer conductance (or uses a constant), shortwave and longwave net radiation, and includes latent heat via evaporation. It requires weather, soil physical and organic properties, and soil water inputs, and provides daily minimum, maximum, and average soil temperatures as outputs. Methods and parameters are largely based on Campbell (1985) Soil physics with BASIC: Transport models for soil-plant systems.
Description.ShortDescription: 1-D layered soil temperature and heat flux model with atmospheric coupling, based on Campbell (1985).

Input.name: physical_Thickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness by layer (top to bottom)

Input.name: weather_Tav
Input.description: Average temperature baseline used for deep soil temp initialization

Input.name: weather_Amp
Input.description: Annual temperature amplitude used for initial deep soil temperature wave

Input.name: weather_Radn
Input.description: Daily global shortwave radiation at surface

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Optional initial soil temperature profile from top layer down

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth to lower boundary where temperature is assumed constant

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Instrument (wind/air temperature) height above surface; default set if zero

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperature at all nodes including air and surface

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Minimum soil temperature per node accumulated over the day

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Maximum soil temperature per node accumulated over the day

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Average soil temperature per node over the day

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Snapshot of soil temperatures at morning (~05:00)

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat capacity per node

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: Thermal conductivity per node (including air node as boundary)

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: Effective heat storage coefficient per node for the time step

Output.name: thermalConductance
Output.description: Conductance between nodes for heat transfer

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Daily mean boundary layer conductance at the surface node

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: Working array of temperatures solved by tridiagonal solver for current sub-step

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Interpolated air temperature used as boundary condition

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation reaching the soil over each internal time step

Output.name: internalTimeStep
Output.description: Internal sub-daily time step length

Output.name: timeOfDaySecs
Output.description: Current simulation time within the day

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated soil water content by layer mapped to nodes

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Canopy height used for boundary layer calculations

Output.name: instrumentHeight
Output.description: Instrument height, constrained to exceed canopy height + 0.5 m

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Stored maximum air temperature from the previous day

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Stored minimum air temperature from the previous day

Function.name: process_SoilTemperature
